entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:21 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -35.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 01:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -35.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -39.5°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 37. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023
